    Akidz Academy Vacancies Primary Daycare Tuition Teacher

    November 3, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Akidz Academy is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Primary Daycare Tuition Teacher position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    • Candidate must possess at least Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma in any field.
    • At least 1 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
    • Preferably Junior Executive specialized in Education or equivalent.

    Company Overview

    ​The company has well established since year 2013 and operate as a day-care centre for students aged 7 to 12. The curriculum consists of tutorial classes for subjects such as Chinese, Bahasa Malaysia, Engish, Science, Mathematics and recreational activities.
    For better academic achievements, the learning programme has integrated with Cambridge English Young Learners to improve students English proficiency.
    • Tutorial classes
    • Educational multimedia programme
    • Daily homework coaching
    • Outdoor activities
    • Fun holiday Camp
    The Day-care centre also provides with an in-house home-cook nutrition lunch and transportation for students before & after school.
    ​And facilities are as below:
    • Akidz club house
    • Science lab
    • library
    • karaoke
    • Games & relax room
    ​​AKidz 多年来都是以“用心做教育”来把最热忱的教育服务给予我们的孩子。我们的教育理念被受家长们的肯定。我们相信给予孩子平衡学习和身心发展的重要性。 AKidz 安亲班提供了一个良好的环境，启发小孩们各方面的学习。
    我们从不放过任何可以教育孩子的机会。
    我们在寻找有爱心，经验与专业的小学老师加入我们的团队，一起启发孩子学习的信心与身心成长。AKidz 将提供专业师资及团队培训, 津贴, 公积金, 年假,  病假,  午膳, 花红, 升职机会。
    AKidz 安亲班对老师的要求是：
    “进班，带着您的信心与用心。
    在班，让孩子拥有您的细心与耐心。
    与同事相处，保持您的虚心。
    与家长交流，表达您的倾心。
    与孩子相处随时交心。

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream education sector job in Bayan Lepas.
    Apply Online
